casebody.data:
GOOD HOPE
v.
NCDHHS. No. 58A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 30, 2006. Susan M. Fradenburg, Greensboro, William W. Stewart, Jr., Raleigh, for Good Hope Hospital. C. Winston Gilchrist, Lillington, for Town of Lillington. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Marcus Lodge, for NCDHHS. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Wallace C. Hollowell, III, Benjamin N. Thompson, K. Edward Greene, Kathleen A. Naggs, Raleigh, Denise M. Gunter, Winston-Salem, for Betsy Johnson Regional Hosp. S. Todd Hemphill, Diana E. Ricketts, Raleigh, for Amisub of NC. Forrest W. Campbell, Greensboro, for N Hospital Asso.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of May 2006 by Petitioners for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Good Hope Hospital, Good Hope Health System and Town of Lillington) shall have up to and including the 21st day of June 2006 to file and serve their brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of May 2006."
